data: {"concept_id": "theme_basics", "concept_name": "Theme (Part 1)", "set": "Narrative", "type": "element", "definition": "Theme as the story’s meaning: emotional, philosophical, or moral anchors that the narrative returns to.", "axes": "anchor_type|clarity|tension_shape|mixing", "axis_values": "emotional|philosophical|moral_dilemma | emergent|stated | question|claim|collision | single_anchor|layered", "source_file": "Theme Part 1.md", "source_md5": "e1e8e01235bb8b8130a12ff8823d9656", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:07:03.341630Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_theme_identify", "concept_id": "theme_basics", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Identify the active anchor(s) (emotional/philosophical/moral) in a passage and cite one cue.", "expected_features": "Correct anchor call + evidence.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "anchor_type|clarity|tension_shape|mixing", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Theme Part 1.md", "source_md5": "e1e8e01235bb8b8130a12ff8823d9656", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:07:03.341630Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_theme_mix", "concept_id": "theme_basics", "cognitive_goal": "design", "task_type": "compose", "prompt_template": "Layer two anchors (e.g., emotional + moral) in the same beat without stating them.", "expected_features": "Anchors visible via action/image, not slogans.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate + justified", "Meets": "Mostly correct", "Developing": "Vague/incorrect"}, "variation_axes": "anchor_type|clarity|tension_shape|mixing", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Theme Part 1.md", "source_md5": "e1e8e01235bb8b8130a12ff8823d9656", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T21:07:03.341630Z"}
